sentences.en: bourgeois ideology
sentences.cn: 资产阶级意识形态

sentences.en: bourgeois morality
sentences.cn: 中产阶级的道德准则

sentences.en: He had a petit bourgeois mentality.
sentences.cn: 他有小资产阶级思想。

sentences.en: He thought they might infect others with their bourgeois ideas.
sentences.cn: 他认为他们可以用他们的资产阶级思想去影响别人。

sentences.en: He's accusing them of having a bourgeois and limited vision.
sentences.cn: 他指责他们像中产阶级一样目光狭隘。

sentences.en: His privileged bourgeois family insisted on a good education.
sentences.cn: 他那优越的资产阶级家庭坚持让他接受良好的教育。

sentences.en: Nowadays there are two ways of concluding a bourgeois marriage.
sentences.cn: 在今日的资产阶级中间,缔结婚姻有两种方式.

sentences.en: On what foundation is the present family , the bourgeois family, based?
sentences.cn: 现代的 、 资产阶级的家庭是建立在什么基础上的 呢 ?

sentences.en: Only one factor contradicted the cultivated bourgeois image - Georgos'hands.
sentences.cn: 唯有一处不符合一位优雅的资产阶级形象 —— 乔戈斯的双手.

sentences.en: Only one factor contradicted the cultivated bourgeois image.
sentences.cn: 唯有一处不符合一位优雅的资产阶级公子的形象.

sentences.en: Petty - bourgeois sentiment should be done away with.
sentences.cn: 要抛弃小资产阶级的伤感情调.

sentences.en: Sadly, the bourgeois citizens of this part of London seemed to keep their bicycles locked away.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是, 伦敦这个地区的资产阶级市民总是锁上车子.

sentences.en: She came from a bourgeois family.
sentences.cn: 她来自一个中产阶级家庭。

sentences.en: She read good books and kept urging Yossarian not to be so bourgeois without the reading.
sentences.cn: 她爱读好书,而且经常劝尤索林不要象小市民一样不读书.

sentences.en: Such petty - bourgeois individualists always look coldly from the side - lines at the people's cause.
sentences.cn: 这种小资产阶级个人主义者对人民的事业总是抱着冷眼旁观的态度.

sentences.en: That was the way bourgeois society valued a man.
sentences.cn: 这就是资产阶级社会评价人的方法。

sentences.en: The abolition of bourgeois individuality, bourgeois independence, and bourgeois freedom is undoubtedly aimed at.
sentences.cn: 的确,正是要消灭资产者的个性 、 独立性和自由.

sentences.en: The Apple Tree; dual personality; pity; chivalry; romantic; bourgeois.
sentences.cn: 《苹果树》; 两面性; 怜悯; 骑士精神; 浪漫化; 资产阶级.

sentences.en: the backlash against bourgeois materialism
sentences.cn: 对世俗的物质主义的鞭挞

sentences.en: The bourgeois papers cried up the book for reasons of their own.
sentences.cn: 资产阶级报纸对那本书大加赞扬,有它们自己的用意.

words.tran_cn: 资本家；九点活字；中产阶级的人；追求物质享受和社会地位者

trans.tran_cn: 资产阶级的，资本家的，商人根性的，市侩的，无教养的，鄙俗的，贪图享受的
资本家；九点活字；中产阶级的人；追求物质享受和社会地位者
trans.tran_en: a member of the middle class, esp one regarded as being conservative and materialistic or (in Marxist thought) a capitalist exploiting the working class
